Package algonquin.cst2355.finalprojectandroid

Interface ConversionDAO

public interface ConversionDAO
The ConversionDAO interface defines the Data Access Object (DAO) for the Conversion class. It provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on the Conversion objects in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    conversionExists(String fromCurrency, String toCurrency, double amount)
    Checks if a specific Conversion object exists in the database based on its currencyFrom, currencyTo, and conversionAmount.

  • Method Details

    • insertConversion

      long insertConversion(Conversion C)
      Inserts a new Conversion object into the database.
      Parameters:
      C - The Conversion object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      The row ID of the inserted Conversion.

    • getAllConversions

      List<Conversion> getAllConversions()
      Retrieves all Conversion objects from the database.
      Returns:
      A List of Conversion objects containing all the conversions in the database.

    • deleteConversion

      void deleteConversion(Conversion c)
      Deletes a specific Conversion object from the database.
      Parameters:
      c - The Conversion object to be deleted.

    • deleteAllConversions

      void deleteAllConversions()
      Deletes all Conversion objects from the database.

    • updateConversion

      void updateConversion(Conversion conversion)
      Updates a specific Conversion object in the database.
      Parameters:
      conversion - The Conversion object to be updated.

    • conversionExists

      boolean conversionExists(String fromCurrency, String toCurrency, double amount)
      Checks if a specific Conversion object exists in the database based on its currencyFrom, currencyTo, and conversionAmount.
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - The source currency of the conversion.
      toCurrency - The target currency of the conversion.
      amount - The amount to be converted.
      Returns:
      true if the Conversion object exists in the database, false otherwise.
